title: Gollum
summary: Gollum is a fictional monstrous character from J. R. R. Tolkien's Middle-earth legendarium. He was introduced in the 1937 fantasy novel The Hobbit, and became important in its sequel, The Lord of the Rings. Gollum was a Stoor Hobbit[T 1][T 2] of the River-folk who lived near the Gladden Fields. In The Lord of the Rings it is stated that he was originally known as Sm√©agol, he was corrupted by the One Ring and later named Gollum after his habit of making "a horrible swallowing noise in his throat".[T 3]
